description:
user can't describe specific addresses in ec2 api:

euca-describe-addresses 192.168.10.100

it return:
ADDRESS 192.168.10.100  None
ADDRESS 192.168.10.101  None
ADDRESS 192.168.10.102  None

it should just return:
ADDRESS 192.168.10.100  None
title: can't describe specific addresses in ec2 api
